meanings.sent1: Her skin looked pimplier than before.
meanings.sent2: The boy's face was getting pimplier by the day.
meanings.sent3: The pimplier the pumpkin, the scarier it looked for Halloween.
meanings.sent4: The road was like a pimplier version of a bumpy ride.
meanings.sent5: The pimplier texture of the orange surprised her.

meanings.sent1: The pizza was even pimplier than the last one.
meanings.sent2: His back was becoming pimplier due to the heat.

meanings.sent5: The pimplier surface of the moon made it more interesting to study.
